title: Day 487
content:
# Day 487

The internet is a funny place and sometimes you just see something so hilarious you use your daily blog to show amazing screenshots.

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*yCTmmETFr0O21N-OybFQrA.png)

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*f6QMY81yDXDU1YrMSJHR6Q.png)

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*LEgtPXaoUdbR5KPK_VEJIg.png)

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*2cFK-bZfcPxA0oqjoEky0g.png)

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*yLLw1Fj1CNr8Y9VlFiUgeA.png)

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*gHUxyDgr4-6mxzGP_tB6FA.png)

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*chp_iRBMOkilrWj4vETAMg.png)

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*YSS0F247VBbUZNp3aSPNmQ.png)

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*2iTzM1E4JliT_f1L039EuQ.png)

If you have not watched the big short I recommend you do that. Then come back and view these memes.

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*vyjMhnkjl2KYYTAZVlOHzQ.png)

Hahahaha these internet crossover memes crack me up. The memetic power of the internet to facilitate customization is incredible. Here is one more meme which I hope future generations can look back on and also appreciate because Twin Peaks is goated. Seriously one of my favorite TV shows all time.

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*TVkas0_xhwAMt6lKNRASAg.jpeg)

7/22/23

Conor Jay Chepenik
